src.Quest

Class QuestTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.Quest.QuestTarget

  • public class QuestTarget
extends java.lang.Object
    The target of a quest as well as the maximum count and the maximum reward

                   int maxCount,
                   int maxReward)
        Initialise a new quest target
        Parameters:
        target - The name of the target
        maxCount - The maximum number of times the target can be found
        maxReward - The maximum reward for completing a quest with this target
